content: विनियुज् {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To use, expend. {@--2@} To appoint, employ. {@--3@} To divide, apportion, distribute; प्रत्येकं विनियुक्तात्मा कथं न ज्ञास्यसि प्रभो <ls>Ku. 2. 31.</ls> {@--4@} To disconnect, separate. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To appoint, employ. {@--2@} To enjoin, order, command. {@--3@} To offer, present, give. {@--4@} To perform, do, dispose of.
